Container.Name: Collabora-CODE
Container.Overview: Updated to not use domain enviroment variable Collabora/Code Online Development Edition - an awesome, Online Office suite image suitable for home use. You can use Collabora/Code for your Nextcloud an edit your Office Documents Online!

Variable.Name: dictionaries
